programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: It's Day 4 of the PCA Main Event: a $10k tournament with an $8.6m prize pool. Big stacks Sergi Reixach and Chris Csik take center stage, while PSPC champ Ramon Colillas aims to win his second major title in the Bahamas.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: In the Bahamas, the prestigious $10k PCA Main Event is playing down to the final two tables. Ramon Colillas and Noah Boeken are among the pros still in the running for the trophy and $1.5m first prize.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: Just 16 players remain from almost a thousand entries at the PCA Main Event. Accomplished American Pro, Jonathan Little hopes to use his experience to make the Final Table and take a shot at the $1.5m first prize.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: The penultimate day of the $10k PCA Main Event continues. 11 players battle it out to get down to the Final Table. Canadian pro Alexandre Raymond has the chip lead, but Portuguese newcomer Pedro Neves is hot on his heels.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: It's Final Table time in the $10k PCA Main Event. The winner set to receive a massive $1.5 million. Pedro Neves has the chip leader, but former EPT champion Artur Martirosian looks to add another major title to his impressive resume.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: Hollywood star Kevin Hart and poker pro Daniel Negreanu take on Challenger Mila Munroe at the cash tables in Monte Carlo. She has to play 150 hands of poker and show a profit.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: British pros Charlie Carrel and Liv Boeree get put through the ringer, as Daniel Negreanu and Kevin Hart enjoy early success in the Monte Carlo cash game.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: The players in the Monte Carlo cash game witness one of the most outrageous poker hands of all time, as comedian Kevin Hart tangles with Challenger Mila Munroe.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: At this exclusive cash game in Monte Carlo, British pro Charlie Carrel plays some big pots against Kevin Hart and Faraz Jaka. Who's going to come out on top?

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: As the session draws to a close, Igor Kurganov joins Kevin Hart and Daniel Negreanu at the table, and Challenger Mila Munroe aims to leave Monte Carlo with a profit.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: A new line-up and a new Challenger. Alex Currie comes to Monte Carlo to play cash poker against his hero, Jaime Staples, plus British pros Jake Cody and Sam Grafton.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: In the exclusive cash game in Monte Carlo, fortune smiles on Jake Cody, while fellow UK pro Sam Grafton continues to clash with businessman Alireza Fatehi.
